metadata.name: PUA- IOX Tunneling Tool Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the use of IOX - a tool for port forwarding and intranet proxy purposes

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\iox.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.exe fwd -l ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.exe fwd -r ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.exe proxy -l ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.exe proxy -r ')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('md5=9db2d314dd3f704a02051ef5ea210993')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('sha1=039130337e28a6623ecf9a0a3da7d92c5964d8dd')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('sha256=c6cf82919b809967d9d90ea73772a8aa1c1eb3bc59252d977500f64f1a0d6731'))))

output.summary: Detects the use of IOX - a tool for port forwarding and intranet proxy purposes

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate use Reference: https://github.com/EddieIvan01/iox
